title: Variable Documentation
subtitle: This page lists all variables that can be used in custom prompts. You can use these variables in prompt templates, and the system will automatically replace them with actual values when generating prompts.

project.title: Project Variables
project.description: Project-related variables containing basic project information and configuration.

task.title: Task Variables
task.description: Task-related variables containing detailed task information and status.

system.title: System Variables
system.description: System-related variables containing system configuration and runtime information.

tasks.title: Task List Variables
tasks.description: Task list related variables for displaying task statistics and lists in the project.

contextRules.title: Context Rules Variables
contextRules.description: Context rules related variables for referencing user's global rules or project-level rules. You can reference all rules or reference individual rules by name.

basicSyntax.title: Basic Syntax
basicSyntax.variableDesc: variable is the variable category (project, task, system, tasks, context_rules)
basicSyntax.propertyDesc: property is the specific property name

notes.title: Notes
notes.item2: If a variable does not exist or is empty, it will display as an empty string
notes.item3: It is recommended to test variables in the preview function before use to ensure they display correctly
notes.item4: Context rules variables support referencing by name, and the name must exactly match the actual rule name
